Hello everyone,

There was an accouncement of a new book "Programming Web Services with Perl"
to XML-RPC list. I haven't read it myself yet, but it has two interesting
chapters (other chapters are about XML-RPC/SOAP/UDDI/WSDL):

  - The REST methodology
  - The future of web services

Could it be the first book covering REST?

# URL is http://www.oreilly.com/catalog/pwebserperl/

--
Taisuke Yamada <tai@...>
Internet Initiative Japan Inc., Technical Planning Division
